scripts.build: echo "BUILD SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && echo "Node version: $(node --version)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && echo "==== Verifying /workspace/package.json (first 30 lines) BEFORE Corepack ====" && head -n 30 /workspace/package.json && echo "==== Verifying /workspace/.pnpmrc contents ====" && cat /workspace/.pnpmrc && echo "Enabling corepack (should pick up packageManager from root package.json)..." && corepack enable && echo "Verifying pnpm version (Corepack should have set this up): $(pnpm --version)" && echo "Removing existing /workspace/node_modules (if any)..." && rm -rf /workspace/node_modules && echo "Running pnpm install (force, frozen lockfile, debug loglevel) from /workspace..." && pnpm install --force --frozen-lockfile --loglevel debug && echo "Listing /workspace/node_modules (if it exists) and .bin AFTER pnpm install to confirm nx shim..." && if [ -d "/workspace/node_modules" ]; then ls -la /workspace/node_modules; if [ -d "/workspace/node_modules/.bin" ]; then ls -la /workspace/node_modules/.bin; else echo "/workspace/node_modules/.bin NOT FOUND"; fi else echo "/workspace/node_modules NOT FOUND"; fi && echo "Attempting to run nx build test-app from /workspace using direct call to /workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx..." && if [ -f "/workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx" ]; then /workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx build test-app --configuration=production; else echo "/workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx NOT FOUND, cannot build."; fi && echo "BUILD SCRIPT FINISHED."
scripts.start: echo "START SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && if [ -f "/workspace/node_modules/.bin/serve" ]; then /workspace/node_modules/.bin/serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}; else echo "Serve command not found in /workspace/node_modules/.bin"; fi
